Daft Punk - Epilogue
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DuDX6wNfjqc

Daft Punk, the Parisian duo responsible for some of the most popular dance and pop songs of all time, have split. They broke the news with an 8-minute video titled “Epilogue,” excerpted from their 2006 film Electroma. Asked if Daft Punk were no more, their longtime publicist Kathryn Frazier confirmed the news to Pitchfork but gave no reason for the breakup.

https://pitchfork.com/news/daft-punk-call-it-quits/
